body:
Exception:
```
134694 [AWT-EventQueue-0] ERROR org.zaproxy.zap.extension.scripts.ScriptsListPanel  - Input length = 1
java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException: Input length = 1
	at java.nio.charset.CoderResult.throwException(CoderResult.java:281)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.implRead(StreamDecoder.java:339)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(StreamDecoder.java:178)
	at java.io.InputStreamReader.read(InputStreamReader.java:184)
	at java.io.BufferedReader.fill(BufferedReader.java:161)
	at java.io.BufferedReader.read1(BufferedReader.java:212)
	at java.io.BufferedReader.read(BufferedReader.java:286)
	at java.io.Reader.read(Reader.java:140)
	at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.script.ExtensionScript.loadScript(Unknown Source)
	at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.scripts.ScriptsListPanel.loadScript(ScriptsListPanel.java:353)
	at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.scripts.ScriptsListPanel.access$000(ScriptsListPanel.java:75)
	at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.scripts.ScriptsListPanel$1.actionPerformed(ScriptsListPanel.java:170)
```

Worth noting that the example script does not load correctly in 2.5.0:
```
132325 [AWT-EventQueue-0] ERROR org.zaproxy.zap.extension.script.ExtensionScript  - java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
com.google.gson.JsonParseException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
	at org.mozilla.zest.core.v1.ZestJSON.deserialize(ZestJSON.java:93)
	at org.mozilla.zest.core.v1.ZestJSON.deserialize(ZestJSON.java:23)
	at com.google.gson.TreeTypeAdapter.read(TreeTypeAdapter.java:58)
	at com.google.gson.internal.bind.TypeAdapterRuntimeTypeWrapper.read(TypeAdapterRuntimeTypeWrapper.java:40)
	at com.google.gson.internal.bind.CollectionTypeAdapterFactory$Adapter.read(CollectionTypeAdapterFactory.java:81)
	at com.google.gson.internal.bind.CollectionTypeAdapterFactory$Adapter.read(CollectionTypeAdapterFactory.java:60)
	at com.google.gson.internal.bind.ReflectiveTypeAdapterFactory$1.read(ReflectiveTypeAdapterFactory.java:93)
	at com.google.gson.internal.bind.ReflectiveTypeAdapterFactory$Adapter.read(ReflectiveTypeAdapterFactory.java:172)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:795)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:859)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:832)
	at org.mozilla.zest.core.v1.ZestJSON.deserialize(ZestJSON.java:90)
	at org.mozilla.zest.core.v1.ZestJSON.deserialize(ZestJSON.java:23)
	at com.google.gson.TreeTypeAdapter.read(TreeTypeAdapter.java:58)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:795)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:761)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:710)
	at com.google.gson.Gson.fromJson(Gson.java:682)
	at org.mozilla.zest.core.v1.ZestJSON.fromString(ZestJSON.java:45)
	at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.zest.ZestScriptWrapper.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.zest.ExtensionZest.scriptAdded(Unknown Source)
[...]
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
	at org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:424)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:357)
	at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
	at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:264)
	at org.mozilla.zest.core.v1.ZestJSON.deserialize(ZestJSON.java:89)
	... 60 more
```
but that's another (unrelated) issue.

The example was fixed in the meantime, it can be opened in ZAP without problems.

To reproduce the (charset) issue it needs to be used the older version:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla/zest/6b16c95efb7784b99b89d033a3fce0a3c1006a5f/examples/BodgeIt_Register_XSS.zst

issue.title: Fallback to default charset when loading scripts

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Change ExtensionScript to fallback to (JVM) default charset if not able
to read with UTF-8. Also, add a method to load a script with a given
charset (e.g. Script Console add-on can prompt the user if neither UTF-8
nor default charset works).
Update the load API endpoint to allow to specify the charset.

Fix #3377 - ZAP can no longer load non UTF8 scripts

issue.title: scripts: inform about scripts with wrong charset
issue.body:
Change ScriptsListPanel to inform the user when the script contains
invalid character sequences and that it needs to be in UTF-8, instead
of showing the generic error.
Bump versions (add-on/ZAP) and update changes in ZapAddOn.xml file.

Related to zaproxy/zaproxy#3377 - ZAP can no longer load non UTF8
scripts

issue.title: Prompt the user for a charset when failed to read the script file

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
From and depends on #3377, change Script Console add-on to prompt the user if both UTF-8 and default charset fails to read the file.

Add-on:
Script Console

issue.title: Change action invoke to allow to set the charset

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in a following main release.

issue.body:
Change ZestActionInvoke to allow to set the charset used in read
operations, to ensure the script is loaded or the output of the program
read, always with expected charset (if not it would rely on the JVM
default charset, which is not always the same).
Update tests to check that the charset is de/serialised.

Related to zaproxy/zaproxy#3377 - ZAP can no longer load non UTF8
scripts

issue.title: Update Zest to 0.14.0

labels.name: zest
labels.description: Issues that require Zest library changes.

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Update Zest library to 0.14.0 (pending release), it contains bug fixes, enhancements, and improves compatibility with newer versions of the browsers (e.g. Chrome, Firefox).

Enhancements:
 - Allow checking the request protocol
 - New ZestAssignment which can filter the parsed DOM by element or attributes and select the content of an element or the value of an attribute
 - Allow to obtain a screenshot from the browsers

Also contains changes related to following ZAP/Zest add-on issues:
 - ZAP can no longer load non UTF8 scripts #3377
 - Selenium - Start Chrome/Firefox in headless mode (for tools) #3866
 - Request body not sent with PUT method in Zest scripts #4337
 - Option to launch browsers with specific profile #4339
 - Update Selenium to 3.13.0 #4776

Add-on:
Zest
